Posts.Content: Feb 16, 2013 04:14PM RKay wrote: I'm new to DCIS cancer and to this breastcancer.org discussion board.  I've just postponed BMX surgery with my "old" ps who gave me "c" size implants in 2005 when I saw the results of his BMX work.  To (use a pun) "cut" to the chase and get to my immediate concern, my question is:  Did you have nipple sparing or non-nipple sparing surgery?  If non-nipple sparing, did they make the incision mid-breast? I have an new consultation scheduled with a new ps who has worked a lot with my gs.  I'm asking my gs and my ps to make my incision below my breast rather in the mid area of my breast, even though they will also have to remove my nipple according to the advice I'm getting from my gs. I'm interested in hearing your experience.  Please share. Thanks, Rhonda
